channel.title: Making magic hit over 30 (delta)
channel.description:
Hey, trying to make any spell.... inparticular sara strike hit over 30 but i only want it for certain ppl so i was thinking in like an item... (dragonstone ring) so i set the stats for that all at 5000 however it will only let me 1hit ko people with melee not magic... i cant figure this out and it is really bugging me if someone could help id really appreciate it
ps: this is a delta
